      • writeString2FileUTF8

        public static void writeString2FileUTF8(java.lang.String text,
                                        java.lang.String filePathName)
        Used to save strings to text files with UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        text - String that will be saved to a text file.
        filePathName - Provide the specific existing directory and file with the extension. e.g. resources/abc/file.json The default root directory is already given by setClassLoaderPath. e.g. C:/tomcat/webapps/tstp2sos/WEB-INF/classes/
        The complete final path: e.g. C:/tomcat/webapps/tstp2sos/WEB-INF/classes/resources/abc/file.json

      • readTextFileWithServletsAsStream_UTF8

        public static java.lang.String readTextFileWithServletsAsStream_UTF8(java.lang.String filePathName)
        Used in jsp/servlets to read a textfile from "src/resources/pathTofile". The argument has to be the path to the file starting from within resources/ directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Provide file name, that should be read. Files are stored in /src/resources/. Use e.g. file1.xml or registered_zrid/default.json to get /src/resources/file1.xml or /src/resources/registered_zrid/default.json.
        Returns:
        Text file content as a string.

        Parameters:
        document - Document object containing the XML.
        indent - The amount of moves to the right.
        Returns:
        Returns a prettyformated string.
        Throws:

      • xmlDocument2SomeSpecificOutputPrettyPrinted

        public static void xmlDocument2SomeSpecificOutputPrettyPrinted(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                                                               javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult outputStream,
                                                               int indent)
                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Used to prettyprint a Document XML object and to display/save it. The outputStream defines what will happen. e.g. System.out, Writer, File, ... Pay attention to the encoding of the XML document! e.g. UTF-8 might misrepresent °C to Â°C. Try ISO-8859-1.
        Parameters:
        document -
        outputStream - Defines what you want to do with the Document object. e.g. System.out to console or write into a file.
        indent -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • prettyPrintXMLString2Console

        public static java.lang.String prettyPrintXMLString2Console(java.lang.String xml,
                                                            java.lang.String encoding,
                                                            int indent)
        Used to prettyPrint a long xml string line.
        Parameters:
        xml -
        encoding - If you do not provide a specific encoding and send "", the encoding will be default UTF-8.
        indent - The size of indent to the right side for new subtags in the xml. e.g. 2
        Returns:
        Returns a prettyPrinted XML string.

      • getRegisteredZrids

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRegisteredZrids(java.lang.String _path)
        Used to get all registered zrid/procedures from the directory resources/registered_zrid. If InsertSensor.xml was successfully accepted by the Sensor Observation Service (SOS), a "name_ort_zrid.json" is created for that specific zrid. Be aware, that the procedure could be deleted in the SOS, but would still remain as a "name_ort_zrid.json" file. There is no synchronization between the SOS backend system and the web application tstp2sos.
        Returns:
        A List with the names of all registered zrids.

      • getActiveInsertObservationServices

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getActiveInsertObservationServices()
        Used to get all active InsertObservation services. Done by checking the resources/insert_observation_services directory. If InsertObservation is successfully executed, a "name_ort_zrid.json" file, will be created in the directory.
        Returns:
        A List with the names of all active InsertObservation services (json files).

      • getFileNamesFromdirectory

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getFileNamesFromdirectory(java.lang.String path)
        Used to get all filenames in a directory.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the directory. Argument e.g. C:/tomcat/webapps/tstp2sos/WEB-INF/classes/resources/
        Returns:
        List of filenames.

      • read1SimpleJsonValue

        public static java.lang.String read1SimpleJsonValue(java.lang.String path2File,
                                                    java.lang.String key)
        Reads just one simple value (from key) from a json and returns the value. Uses a custom method to open and read file.
        Parameters:
        path2File - Provide file name, that should be read. Files are stored in /src/resources/. Use e.g. file1.xml or registered_zrid/default.json to get /src/resources/file1.xml or /src/resources/registered_zrid/default.json.
        key - The key where you want to read the value from.
        Returns:
        One string value.
